com.mousebird.maply

Class GlobeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.View
      • com.mousebird.maply.GlobeView

  • public class GlobeView
extends View
    The Globe View handles math related to user position and orientation. It's largely opaque to toolkit users. The MaplyController handles passing data to and getting data from it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean northUp
      Set if we want to keep north pointed upward as the user moves

      • Fields inherited from class com.mousebird.maply.View

        nativeHandle
